Text.Language: Ten]wou ne w~ y/e~tenhot: nem piaggeloc n~te pic~mou: je ,ere ke ,aritwmen/ w~ y/eymeh n~hmot: ouoh Po#c# sop neme.
We glorify you O trusted one, with the angel of blessing saying, "Hail to you O full of grace, the Lord is with you."
